FWBO Centres in North and South America

properties.name: Aryaloka Retreat Centre
properties.description: Posted by Fwbo14 Heartwood Circle, Newmarket, NH 03857-2120, USAAryaloka is a place dedicated to the study and practice of Buddhism. Located in Newmarket NH, we are part of the Friends of the Western Buddhist Order (FWBO) -- a worldwide network of meditation centers, communities, and ethical businesses. Aryaloka Buddhist Center 14 Heartwood Circle Newmarket, NH 03857-2120 USA (603) 659-5456

properties.name: Nagaloka Buddhist Center (FWBO Portland, Maine)
properties.description: Posted by FwboNagaloka Buddhist Center is located at 51 Ocean Avenue, Portland, Maine 04103. Nagaloka Buddhist Center offers an opportunity for individuals to learn the ancient tradition of Buddhism, and to learn meditation. Nagaloka encourages seekers to come and visit our Center to find out first hand the practice of Buddhism.

properties.name: New York City FWBO Centre
properties.description: Posted by FwboWe run ongoing introductions to meditation in Greenwich Village on Thursdays. For other activities see the website.

properties.name: San Francisco FWBO Center
properties.description: Posted by Fwbo37 Bartlett Street, San Francisco, CAWe are located in San Francisco\'s Mission district, and provide a comprehensive program of Buddhist meditation classes and courses, Buddhism courses, writing and performance events, yoga classes, weekend and week-long retreats, nonresidential day retreats, and more! For more information, see our calendar. We also offer some reasonably-priced meditation supplies, books, and cards.
